welcome_register: No, I want to sign up!
not_a_user: Don't have an account? Sign Up
already_a_user: Already have an account? Sign In
forgot_password_subtitle: To reset your password, simply type your email bellow.
reset_password_subtitle: Type below your new password and make sure it's at least 8 characters long and contain at least one number, one Caital letter and one special character.
onboarding_user_title: Welcome to the new world of crypto
onboarding_user_subtitle: Now that you have an acount, you can start using COMPANY NAME but before that, we need to know a little bit about you.
verification_title: Yay! Now just a few more steps to get you started.
verification_subtitle: We need to verify your identity to make sure you are who you say you are. Please check the code on your email and enter it bellow.
new_email: Click here to recieve a new email
payment_subtitle: In this section you'll see the merchant's payment confirmation. If not accepted It will be deleted in 5 minutes.
user_dashboard_subtitle: Below you can see all the transactions you have made
company_dashboard_subtitle: Below you can see all the transactions you have made
token_subtitle: This is your company's plugin token, here you can generate a new one in case you don't have one ir you have lost the previous one
